attributes.title: Worst app I’ve seen 😔💕🧚‍♀️
attributes.review:
Absolutely awful. As soon as the app downloaded I opened it to see an obese abnormally large Cheeto man, naked singing the national anthem. It was horrific. 
I would never recommend this app to anyone let alone my children, I can’t believe they allow such things on the App Store. I never want anyone seeing this terrifying looking man baby, it should be taken down immediately.

attributes.title: WORST APP! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: Made my phone glitch and ran the battery down super low never ever had a problem with trump until now it was spreading a bunch of fake news and it asked if I would allow notifications so I said allow and it just started sending non stop notifications and I had to go buy a new phone because it messed my phone up so bad. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP YOU WILL REGRET IT IT WILL MESS YOUR PHONE UP!!!!!

attributes.title: This deserves ZERO stars!!! 😡
attributes.review: My name is Karen and after finding out that my dear idol made an app I was so excited!! I immediately downloaded this app since it would feed me with a bunch of cheeto man content 😍🤤🤤 but when I opened the app I saw a big fat orange on my screen!! 😡😡 This is so offensive and rude. I am offended. He is all sweaty and gross this isnt how my cheeto man is ☹️ like has he heard about working out?? And is that a fake tan how gross.

attributes.title: Don’t work
attributes.review:
I was expecting to see Trump but instead I saw a dolphin doing its business with a turtle and I couldn’t un see it and the, I tried reopening the app and it crashed on me it also has horrible ads. Another disclaimer is that I saw corn on, trumps hair I got convinced that that, was his hair until I had to wash my eyes with bleach to see clearly. 
Thank you for reading my review I hope this helped

attributes.title: Not the Right Man for the Job
attributes.review: This app and this man are pathetic and a disgrace. He preaches of making America great again. But the fact is it hasn’t really been great ever. If we want to make this country better going forward we need better leaders. And with this upcoming generation full of new ideas and mindsets we need more open minded leaders to match. And he is definitely not the president to do it.

attributes.title: almost died
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to of course, support my child rapist president ! 💗💗upon seeing the ‘trump2020’ sign, i started hyperventilating and sweating profusely. my hair started falling out and parts of my beloved phone exploded, the parts hitting me right in my 🐱. i had to be rushed to the ER for an emergency surgery or else my 🐱 would’ve been destroyed. don’t download this app if you care about your private parts, women.

attributes.title: REGRET PLS HELP
attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc it’s the #1 app for news, i’ve seen so many GREAT reviews i had to get it but ngl i immediately got bad vibes✨THIS i regret i was hoping to get what i deserved. and nothing can turn around😔this app has false information and needs to be fixed😿i can’t get my news. PLS PLS don’t download i’m saving you the trouble but if u must pls go ahead and review★☆☆☆☆ lets b honest lEtS uS jUst be rEaL🤚🏼😣

attributes.title: It brought roaches
attributes.review: This app took like 2 years to download and when I opened the app it played the worst music possible it MADE MY EARS BLEED not only that but after the music stared playing with in minutes roaches and spiders then they stared fighting and I was unsafe so I had to go live in a hotel until the finished clearing out the roaches and spiders but this I think tracked my location so now I feel unsafe.

attributes.title: Trumps a Rapist 🍊🍊🍊🌪✨
attributes.review: If I could give it 0 stars I would. Took ages to download. I just wanted to see what the boomers and Karen’s were talking about.😓it made my phone blow up with tweets like all lives matter, Hispanics are rapists and poc are thugs 🥺 and Then the worst part of all it made my phone glitch on and off saying “trump is a thick juicy orange 🍊 “ and it before it turned off my phone it whispered “trump isn’t a rapist” 😖😖

attributes.title: Racist app
attributes.review: I have no I idea what I did wrong but somehow this app found out I was a person of color. Which in my case seemed a little fishy and very discouraging. My phone kept lagging and glitching to the point that I had to get a new phone and also change my credit card info. This app is a scam and your president is a big orange dummy who needs to go back into his bunker. Hugs and kisses. Xoxo gossip girl.
